attributes.action: Stop the proposed changes to our waste collection services
attributes.additional_details: This will cause a lot of problems for not residents, especially the ones with children,the disabled, people who use incontinence aids, sanitary towels, and have animals like myself. This proposed change needs stopping before it's too late.
attributes.background:
Neath Port Talbot county council are in talks and proposing to make our black bin collection 3 weekly. Summer is on its way and this will cause a lot of problems eg rats, cats, flies, ants,foxes etc
 Please make a stand and sign this petition, this is just not acceptable

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local waste collection are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
